ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2010_01_15.shtml: new zmap release notes for 15 January 2010
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2010_01_15.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 15/01/2010
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.12481/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: reverted yesterdays non-fix
  • doc/Grant/GRANT_APP.txt: sticking this here for now...
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: fix bug in exon number reporting when revcompd.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapXRemote.h: hack version to match lace version...temporary....
  • src/zmapControl/remote/zmapXRemote.c: hack version to match lace version...temporary....
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: remove checking for existing feature as temp fix...
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowDraw.c, items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c, items/zmapWindowContainerGroup.c, items/zmapWindowContainerGroup.h: Fix setting of values in multiple styles so that zooming and hidden columns work again.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: fix my own stupid file permissions bug.
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.h, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerUtils.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: unsorted featuresets on new feature added to try to fix overlap bug - displayed format is now stable from first display. Difficult to test as cannot create overlap on demand
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: fixed indirection error in in windowDrawContextCB
  • src/: zmapControl/zmapControlPreferences.c, zmapUtils/zmapGUINotebook.c, zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: fixed prefernces dialog for blixem path, now runs even if not congigured
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c: use new call to set display in feature set container.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c, zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.h: add new version of display mode setting code to fix bugs.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColConfig.c: fix up a few bugs in interactions between col dialog and menu hide.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c: Silly uninitialized variable bug. Better now
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowColBump.c, zmapWindowMenus.c, zmapWindow_P.h: made unbump all columns work as exepcted

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w9/blxFetch.c: Fixed a memory bug that was causing readConfigFile to fail on 64 bit machines
  • w9/blxview.c: Added extra debug for the error in calcID where requested coords are out of range
